ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَٱسْتَوَىٰٓ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ حُكْمًا وَعِلْمًا ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَمَّا [And when] بَلَغَ [he reached] أَشُدَّهُۥ [his full strength] وَٱسْتَوَىٰٓ [and became mature] ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ [We bestowed upon him] حُكْمًۭا [wisdom] وَعِلْمًۭا ۚ [and knowledge] وَكَذَٰلِكَ [And thus] نَجْزِى [We reward] ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ [the good-doers]
ayahs.transliteration: Walamma balagha ashuddahu wastawaataynahu hukman waAAilman wakathalikanajzee almuhsineen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَدَخَلَ ٱلْمَدِينَةَ عَلَىٰ حِينِ غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ أَهْلِهَا فَوَجَدَ فِيهَا رَجُلَيْنِ يَقْتَتِلَانِ هَـٰذَا مِن شِيعَتِهِۦ وَهَـٰذَا مِنْ عَدُوِّهِۦ ۖ فَٱسْتَغَـٰثَهُ ٱلَّذِى مِن شِيعَتِهِۦ عَلَى ٱلَّذِى مِنْ عَدُوِّهِۦ فَوَكَزَهُۥ مُوسَىٰ فَقَضَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ۖ قَالَ هَـٰذَا مِنْ عَمَلِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَدُوٌّ مُّضِلٌّ مُّبِينٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَدَخَلَ [And he entered] ٱلْمَدِينَةَ [the city] عَلَىٰ [at] حِينِ [a time] غَفْلَةٍۢ [(of) inattention] مِّنْ [of] أَهْلِهَا [its people] فَوَجَدَ [and found] فِيهَا [therein] رَجُلَيْنِ [two men] يَقْتَتِلَانِ [fighting each other] هَـٰذَا [this] مِن [of] شِيعَتِهِۦ [his party] وَهَـٰذَا [and this] مِنْ [of] عَدُوِّهِۦ ۖ [his enemy] فَٱسْتَغَـٰثَهُ [And called him for help] ٱلَّذِى [the one who] مِن [(was) from] شِيعَتِهِۦ [his party] عَلَى [against] ٱلَّذِى [the one who] مِنْ [(was) from] عَدُوِّهِۦ [his enemy] فَوَكَزَهُۥ [so Musa struck him with his fist] مُوسَىٰ [so Musa struck him with his fist] فَقَضَىٰ [and killed him] عَلَيْهِ ۖ [and killed him] قَالَ [He said] هَـٰذَا [This (is)] مِنْ [of] عَمَلِ [(the) deed] ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ ۖ [(of) Shaitaan] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, he] عَدُوٌّۭ [(is) an enemy ] مُّضِلٌّۭ [one who misleads] مُّبِينٌۭ [clearly]
ayahs.transliteration: Wadakhala almadeenata AAala heenighaflatin min ahliha fawajada feeha rajulayniyaqtatilani hatha min sheeAAatihi wahathamin AAaduwwihi fastaghathahu allathee minsheeAAatihi AAala allathee min AAaduwwihifawakazahu moosa faqada AAalayhi qala hathamin AAamali ashshaytani innahu AAaduwwun mudillunmubeen

words.translation: so Musa struck him with his fist
so Musa struck him with his fist

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِى فَٱغْفِرْ لِى فَغَفَرَ لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبِّ [My Lord] إِنِّى [Indeed, I] ظَلَمْتُ [[I] have wronged] نَفْسِى [my soul] فَٱغْفِرْ [so forgive] لِى [[for] me] فَغَفَرَ [Then He forgave] لَهُۥٓ ۚ [[for] him] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed He] هُوَ [He (is)] ٱلْغَفُورُ [the Oft-Forgiving] ٱلرَّحِيمُ [the Most Merciful]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala rabbi innee thalamtunafsee faghfir lee faghafara lahu innahu huwa alghafooruarraheem

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَىَّ فَلَنْ أَكُونَ ظَهِيرًا لِّلْمُجْرِمِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبِّ [My Lord] بِمَآ [Because] أَنْعَمْتَ [You have favored] عَلَىَّ [[on] me] فَلَنْ [so not] أَكُونَ [I will be] ظَهِيرًۭا [a supporter] لِّلْمُجْرِمِينَ [(of) the criminals]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala rabbi bima anAAamtaAAalayya falan akoona thaheeran lilmujrimeen

ayahs.textUthmani: فَأَصْبَحَ فِى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ خَآئِفًا يَتَرَقَّبُ فَإِذَا ٱلَّذِى ٱسْتَنصَرَهُۥ بِٱلْأَمْسِ يَسْتَصْرِخُهُۥ ۚ قَالَ لَهُۥ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّكَ لَغَوِىٌّ مُّبِينٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَأَصْبَحَ [In the morning he was] فِى [in] ٱلْمَدِينَةِ [the city] خَآئِفًۭا [fearful] يَتَرَقَّبُ [(and) was vigilant] فَإِذَا [when behold] ٱلَّذِى [The one who] ٱسْتَنصَرَهُۥ [sought his help] بِٱلْأَمْسِ [the previous day] يَسْتَصْرِخُهُۥ ۚ [cried out to him for help] قَالَ [Said] لَهُۥ [to him] مُوسَىٰٓ [Musa] إِنَّكَ [Indeed, you] لَغَوِىٌّۭ [(are) surely a deviator] مُّبِينٌۭ [clear]
ayahs.transliteration: Faasbaha fee almadeenati kha-ifanyataraqqabu fa-itha allathee istansarahu bil-amsiyastasrikhuhu qala lahu moosa innakalaghawiyyun mubeen

words.translation: cried out to him for help

ayahs.textUthmani: فَلَمَّآ أَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يَبْطِشَ بِٱلَّذِى هُوَ عَدُوٌّ لَّهُمَا قَالَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ أَتُرِيدُ أَن تَقْتُلَنِى كَمَا قَتَلْتَ نَفْسًۢا بِٱلْأَمْسِ ۖ إِن تُرِيدُ إِلَّآ أَن تَكُونَ جَبَّارًا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا تُرِيدُ أَن تَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُصْلِحِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَلَمَّآ [Then when] أَنْ [[that]] أَرَادَ [he wanted] أَن [to] يَبْطِشَ [strike] بِٱلَّذِى [the one who] هُوَ [[he] (was)] عَدُوٌّۭ [an enemy] لَّهُمَا [to both of them] قَالَ [he said] يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ [O Musa] أَتُرِيدُ [Do you intend] أَن [to] تَقْتُلَنِى [kill me] كَمَا [as] قَتَلْتَ [you killed] نَفْسًۢا [a person] بِٱلْأَمْسِ ۖ [yesterday] إِن [Not] تُرِيدُ [you want] إِلَّآ [but] أَن [that] تَكُونَ [you become] جَبَّارًۭا [a tyrant] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] وَمَا [and not] تُرِيدُ [you want] أَن [that] تَكُونَ [you be] مِنَ [of] ٱلْمُصْلِحِينَ [the reformers]
ayahs.transliteration: Falamma an arada an yabtishabillathee huwa AAaduwwun lahuma qalaya moosa atureedu an taqtulanee kama qataltanafsan bil-amsi in tureedu illa an takoona jabbaranfee al-ardi wama tureedu an takoona mina almusliheen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَجَآءَ رَجُلٌ مِّنْ أَقْصَا ٱلْمَدِينَةِ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱلْمَلَأَ يَأْتَمِرُونَ بِكَ لِيَقْتُلُوكَ فَٱخْرُجْ إِنِّى لَكَ مِنَ ٱلنَّـٰصِحِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَجَآءَ [And came] رَجُلٌۭ [a man] مِّنْ [from] أَقْصَا [(the) farthest end] ٱلْمَدِينَةِ [(of) the city] يَسْعَىٰ [running] قَالَ [He said] يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ [O Musa] إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلْمَلَأَ [the chiefs] يَأْتَمِرُونَ [are taking counsel] بِكَ [about you] لِيَقْتُلُوكَ [to kill you] فَٱخْرُجْ [so leave] إِنِّى [indeed, I am] لَكَ [to you] مِنَ [of] ٱلنَّـٰصِحِينَ [the sincere advisors]
ayahs.transliteration: Wajaa rajulun min aqsaalmadeenati yasAAa qala ya moosa innaalmalaa ya/tamiroona bika liyaqtulooka fakhruj innee lakamina annasiheen

ayahs.textUthmani: فَخَرَجَ مِنْهَا خَآئِفًا يَتَرَقَّبُ ۖ قَالَ رَبِّ نَجِّنِى مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَخَرَجَ [So he left] مِنْهَا [from it] خَآئِفًۭا [fearing] يَتَرَقَّبُ ۖ [(and) vigilant] قَالَ [He said] رَبِّ [My Lord] نَجِّنِى [Save me] مِنَ [from] ٱلْقَوْمِ [the people ] ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ [the wrongdoers]
ayahs.transliteration: Fakharaja minha kha-ifanyataraqqabu qala rabbi najjinee mina alqawmi aththalimeen
